original: Bengtsson, Per Adolf, bankkamrer, Varberg, f. 19/12/96 i Kalv s :n, Älvsb. 1., av köpm. Sven Carl B. o. Johanna Pettersson. G. 28 m. Stina Hellström. Barn: Olle f. 31, Kerstin 35, Björn 42. — Realex. i Varberg 12, handisk. i Varberg 13. Anst. h. fadern i Varberg 13-20, bokhåll. v. Varbergs Stads Sparbank 21-30, kamr. där sed. 30. Led. av styr. f. Varbergs gymn:- o. idrrfören. 22-35, kassör där sju år, led. av styr. f. fören. Varbergs idr:-pliats 26-38, dess ordf. i flera år, rev. i Knutssons Marmeladfabr. A-B, kassör i Norgehjälpen i Varberg 43-45. Medl. av Frimurarorden. Hobbies: gymnastik o. tennis. PatrGM.
translated: Bengtsson, Per Adolf, bank clerk, from Varberg. Born on December 19th, 1896 in Kalv parish, Älvsborg county, son of merchant Sven Carl B. and Johanna Pettersson. Married to Stina Hellström in 1928 and had three children: Olle (born 1931), Kerstin (born 1935), and Björn (born 1942). Attended Realskolan in Varberg from 1912 and completed a commerce degree there in 1913. Employed by his father in Varberg from 1913-1920, and worked as an accountant at Varberg City Savings Bank from 1921-1930, and then as a bank clerk there until retirement. He was on the board of Varberg's gymnastics and sports association from 1922-1935, treasurer there for seven years, and chairman of the Varberg Sports Club for many years. He served as a reviewer at Knutsson's Marmalade Factory, and was treasurer for the Norwegian Aid Association in Varberg from 1943-1945. He was also a member of the Freemason Order. His hobbies included gymnastics and tennis. Patrol Guard Master.
